data.title: GC Conversation with Karla Robertson, EVP and General Counsel at Pentair
data.meta_description: Karla Robertson, EVP and general counsel at Pentair, has been fortunate at every stage of her career with strong mentors and good teams.
data.text:
GC Conversation with Anne-Marie D'Angelo, EVP, GC and Corporate Secretary at NiSource

In this episode of GC Conversations, Anne-Marie Dâ€™Angelo at NiSorce tells Heather Fine and Michael Sachs about the literal sign that took her from private practice to in-house work.

GC Conversation with Scott Levin at FTD

Scott Levin, CAO and GC at FTD, loves what he does and it shows. In this episode of GC Conversations with Michael Sachs, a long-time friend and collaborator, he chats about his career and laughs about the challenges of working remotely from a very active home.

Read More www.mlaglobal.com/en-gb/insights/videos/gc-conversations/gc-conversation-with-scott-levin-ftd
